price: Ijoro ry’iteka nta ngere, ni ijoro iciza gikozwe muri ryo, gisumba mu ndishi iciza gikozwe mu mezi igihumbi atagiramwo iryo joro[1].
arabic: لَيۡلَةُ ٱلۡقَدۡرِ خَيۡرٞ مِّنۡ أَلۡفِ شَهۡرٖ
footnotes: [1] Iyo ni impano, Imana Allah Yageneye gusa abantu barungikiwe Intumwa Muhamadi (nyakugira amahoro n’impuhwe z’Imana Allah).

meta.transliteration: laylatu al-qadri khayrun min alfi shahrin
